Posts.Content: I'd been putting off my first mammogram (I'm 44) but finally went in a few weeks ago. Radiology called me back and wants me to return for an ultrasound due to a "4 cm mass" in my right breast. Immediately I felt the breast and sure enough, there is a good-size lump there, the size of a large grape or a medium sized walnut. The first ultrasound appointment I could get will be almost a month from the mammogram.
Posts.Title: possible fibroadenoma
